Auth.loginDescription: We'll send you a code to log in
Auth.noPasswordNeeded: No password needed. We'll email you a secure code.

FIRBCalculator.title: FIRB Calculator
FIRBCalculator.subtitle: Calculate your complete property investment costs including FIRB fees, stamp duty, and ongoing expenses
FIRBCalculator.description: Calculate your complete property investment costs including FIRB fees, stamp duty, and ongoing expenses

citizenship.title: Citizenship Status
citizenship.description: Tell us about your citizenship status to determine your eligibility and requirements

australian.title: Australian Citizen
australian.description: Born in Australia or naturalized Australian citizen

permanent.title: Permanent Resident
permanent.description: Hold a permanent residence visa (subclass 100, 189, 190, etc.)

temporary.title: Temporary Resident
temporary.description: Hold a temporary visa (student, work, partner visa)

foreign.title: Foreign Person
foreign.description: Do not hold Australian citizenship or residency

visaType.label: What is your visa type?
visaType.description: Please select your temporary visa type

ordinarilyResident.label: Are you ordinarily resident in Australia?
ordinarilyResident.description: If you are not ordinarily resident, you may need FIRB approval even as an Australian citizen

info.australian: Australian citizens generally do not need FIRB approval unless they are not ordinarily resident in Australia.
info.permanent: Permanent residents generally do not need FIRB approval for residential property purchases.
info.temporary: Temporary residents require FIRB approval and may have restrictions on property types they can purchase.
info.foreign: Foreign persons require FIRB approval for all residential property purchases in Australia.

property.title: Property Details
property.description: Enter the details of the property you are interested in
property.typeLabel: What type of property is it?
property.stateLabel: Which Australian state is the property in?

firstHome.label: Are you a first home buyer?
firstHome.description: First home buyers may be eligible for concessions

property.entityDescription: The entity type may affect FIRB requirements and tax implications

financialDetails.title: Financial Details
financialDetails.description: Enter financial details for investment analysis

rental.title: Rental Income
rental.vacancyHelp: Typical: 3-5% for good locations, 7-10% for high-risk areas
rental.help: Based on similar properties in the area. You can adjust this later.

growth.title: Capital Growth Projections
growth.help: Historical average: 6% per year. Adjust based on your expectations.

financialDetails.councilRatesHelp: Typical: $1,500-$3,000 per year. Leave blank to use estimate.
financialDetails.selfManaged: I will self-manage this property (no management fees)

review.title: Review Your Details
review.description: Please review the information you have entered before generating your report.

approval.notRequiredDesc: You can proceed with your property purchase without FIRB approval.
approval.requiredDesc: You must obtain FIRB approval before purchasing this property.
approval.prohibitedDesc: You are not eligible to purchase this property type.

summary.title: Eligibility Summary
summary.description: Overview of your eligibility status and property details

costs.title: Cost Breakdown
costs.description: Complete breakdown of all upfront and ongoing costs

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This calculation is an estimate only and should not be considered financial or legal advice. Regulations and fees can change. Always consult with a qualified professional before making investment decisions.

optimalUseCase.title: Optimal Use Case Analysis
optimalUseCase.description: Compare long-term rental vs short-stay accommodation to maximize your returns
optimalUseCase.recommendLongTerm: Long-term rental is recommended for this property.
optimalUseCase.recommendShortStay: Short-stay accommodation is recommended for this property.
optimalUseCase.recommendMixed: A mixed strategy may be optimal for this property.

shortStay.title: Short-Stay Accommodation
shortStay.prohibited: Short-stay accommodation is not permitted in this area.
